dublin_core.dcvalue: Cognitive behavioral therapy CBT has been shown to have positive effects on the management of irritable bowel syndrome IBS symptoms A factorial pilot randomized placebo controlled trial called MIBS tested the potential effectiveness of a self management CBT based website alongside two medications methylcellulose and mebeverine and a placebo The results showed no significant differences in quality of life or symptom severity measures but enablement and participant s global assessment of relief was higher in the website groups
Exploring patients' views of a cognitive behavioral therapy-based website for the self-management of irritable bowel syndrome symptoms.
